DavidMohrhardt.animator

Class SpriteBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • DavidMohrhardt.animator.SpriteBuilder

  • class SpriteBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Version:
    0.01 This is the animator package. This file is the SpriteBuilder. The SpriteBuilder is essentially a parser for reading sprite scripts and loading the sprite sheet into the program itself.
    Author:
    David Mohrhardt
